coreAttributes.name: asshole web-seal
coreAttributes.description: A thick layer of sticky spider-webbing has been shot all over [npc.namePos] [npc.asshole+], completely sealing it and preventing it from being penetrated!

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] spinneret to quickly shoot a thick binding of spider-webbing all over [npc.her] [npc.asshole+].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] spinneret to quickly shoot a thick binding of spider-webbing all over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.asshole+].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] spinneret to quickly shoot a thick binding of spider-webbing all over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.asshole+].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the webbing which was covering [npc.her] [npc.asshole] and [npc.verb(throw)] it away.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the webbing which was covering [npc2.namePos] [npc2.asshole] and [npc.verb(throw)] it away.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(tear)] off the webbing which was covering [npc2.namePos] [npc2.asshole] and [npc.verb(throw)] it away.
